name: Idli
description: Hot and fluffy, made of our home-made fermented batter, served twith coconut chutney and special chutney of the day.

name: Masala Dosa
description: Dosa topped with aloo masala and served with spiced sambar, coconut chutney and special chutney of the day.

name: Poori Sabzi
description: Pooris made with perfect blend of wheat flour, served with aloo matar tamatar sabzi and raita.

name: Aloo Paratha
description: Flavorful and spiced potato stuffing, rolled inside a freshly made whole wheat dough, and cooked to perfection on a griddle.

name: Garlic Naan
description: Good old naan cooked in a mix of garlic paste and ghee.

name: Dal Tadka
description: Boiled lentils tempered with a simmering mix of cumin seeds, mustard seeds, garlic, chilies, and curry leaves tossed into ghee.

name: Paneer Tikka Masala
description: Chunks of tender cottage cheese marinated in a mix of signature spices, grilled on a tandoor to add a crispy edge.

name: Chicken Lababdar
description: Boneless chicken pieces marinated and cooked in a mix of onions, tomatoes, cream, ginger, butter, mustard oil, salt, cumin seeds, and a melange of spices.

name: Samosa
description: Most popular north indian snacks filled with special potato mixture, served with sweet and green chutney for a hearty delicious snack.

name: Pakoda
description: A true anytime snack made by mixing thin sliced onions, spices, salts & herbs in gram flour dip and fried to form a crunchy and light pakodas.

name: Nimki
description: A crunchy savoury snack prep in maida delicately seasoned with carom (ajwain) and nigella seeds.

name: Chai
description: Sweet and spicy notes of flavourful green cardamom pods infused with fresh tea.

name: Manchow Soup
description: Hot & Spicy soup made with a healthy combo of beans, carrots, cabbage, shiitake mushrooms served alongside crispy noodles.

name: Paneer Chilly
description: A favourite of the veg lovers; this spicy vegetarian dish meets the flavours of China with tender paneer tossed in soya and other home-made chilli sauce alongside garlic, onions and green chillies with the final sprinkle of spring onion on top.

name: Cheese Pizza
description: Cheese overloaded pizza with a medley of Mozzarella, Cheddar & Ghost pepper flavoured cheese.

name: Chicken Biryani
description: Tender chicken pieces are marinated with exuberant bhuna spices that are freshly ground and dum pukht with aromatic rice.

name: Rasgulla
description: A Bengali indulgence of cloud-like chenna balls soaked in delicately sweetened syrup, blissful in every bite.

name: Gulab Jamun
description: Beloved and irresistible, the gulab jamun with its melt-in-your-mouth texture, made with farm fresh khova and shuddh ghee, will keep you coming back for more.

name: Rasmalai
description: Delicate cottage cheese dumplings soaked in fragrant saffron milk, garnished with pistachios. A harmonious fusion of textures and flavors that embodies the essence of Indian sweet traditions. Experience pure indulgence that lingers on the palate.

name: Rabdi Jalebi
description: Spiral-shaped crispy jalebis soaked in chashni paired with creamy, rich milk reduction rabdi, made for each other!
